content: this is the pattern for a bicycle appliqué **i do have this pattern available for free on my website if you would prefer that option the link is down below but i ve made it available for people to download as well for $1 on ravelry ** there is also a video tutorial for the pattern available on my youtube channel at crochet bicycle applique tutorial 1 i ve used 4 ply cotton and a 1 25mm crochet hook but you can use different sizes depending on what you re most comfortable with * i used red grey black green white and yellow 4 ply crochet cotton * a crochet hook i used a 1 25mm hook * scissors * darning needle to weave in ends * sewing thread and a sewing needle to stitch the bike together * small beads if desired to stitch to the flowers 1 https //youtu be/o4w9aq8vtyc
